name: yuta519.github.io (This website)
description: My profile site. Including not only profile, but also blogs I wrote. This web site uses newer techniques like Next.js, Typescript and TailwindCSS. I choose next stacks that will be main streams I believe.

name: Notion API SDK
description: This is a library to use Notion API. In this web site, there are some blogs. And I wrote these blogs with Notion. So I created this library for exporting Notion pages automatically. By using this library, it is efficient to deploy blogs from Notion to this web site

name: Zscaler Python SDK
description: This is a library to use Zsclaer Internet Access API. In my Japanese career, there are a lot of opportunities to use 3rd pary security products. One of those is Zscaler. To autmate some tasks, I created this library.

name: Zscaler Go SDK
description: This is a library to use Zsclaer Internet Access API.
